    glb.cdnConfig.headerConfig = glb.cdnConfig.headerConfig || {
      brand: {link: "http://g1.globo.com/"},
      editoria: {label: "Profissão Repórter", link: "http://g1.globo.com/profissao-reporter/"},
    };

    glb.headerReady = true;
    glb.headerCdn = true;
    document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
  </script><style type="text/css">#menu-container{display:none}</style><nav id="menu-container" class="regua-navegacao-tab menu-container menu-no-animation"><div id="menu-rounder" class="menu-rounder"><div id="menu-cascade" class="menu-cascade" data-menu-index="0"><ul class="menu-root menu-level menu-level-0"><li class="menu-item menu-item-grouped " <script>

</script>
<script>
googletag.cmd.push(function() {
var mapping970 = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([0, 0], [[300, 250], [300, 100], [300, 25]]).addSize([750, 600], [[970, 90], [728,90]]).addSize([960, 690], [[970, 90], [728,90]]).addSize([1024, 768], [[970, 90], [728,90]]).build();var mapping300 = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([1024, 768], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([960, 690], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([640, 480], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([0, 0], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).build();var mapping600 = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([1024, 768], [[300, 600], [300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([960, 690], [[300, 600], [300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([640, 480], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).addSize([0, 0], [[300, 250], [300, 25]]).build();var mapping728 = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([1024, 768], [[728, 90], [468, 60], [320, 50]]).addSize([640, 480], [[468, 60], [320, 50]]).addSize([0, 0], [[320, 50]]).build();	googletag.defineSlot('/10646962/especiais_970x90_1', [[728,90],[468,60],[970,90],[320,50]], 'div-bfcbf186e764790bf40d1822ec42c7ef').defineSizeMapping(mapping970).addService(googletag.pubads());
	googletag.defineSlot('/10646962/especiais_970x90_2', [[728,90],[468,60],[970,90],[320,50]], 'div-8fa9e1b320c30771c9689cd005eb1dcd').defineSizeMapping(mapping970).addService(googletag.pubads());
	googletag.defineSlot('/10646962/especiais_970x90_3', [[728,90],[468,60],[970,90],[320,50]], 'div-26500de8f7d8d1904859e69a117e5de8').defineSizeMapping(mapping970).addService(googletag.pubads());

	googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
	googletag.enableServices();
});
</script>


     <!-- <meta property="og:image" content=""/> -->

     <!-- endbuild -->
  </head>
  <body>

	<section id="content">
		<div class="center">

			<div class="publicidade-newsletter">
      <div class="pub adCabecalho">

			<div class="editorias especiais">
				<div class="noticia-title">
					<h1>ESPECIAIS</h1>
					<div class="noticia-publicacao">VOCÊ ESTÁ AQUI:  <a href="" class="hover">Especiais</a></div>
				</div>


				<div class="compartilhar-interna">
					<nav>
						<a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais" target="_blank" class="fb"><i class="fa fa-facebook-square"></i>Facebook</a>
						<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?via=Estrelando&url=http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais" target="_blank" class="tw"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i>Twitter</a>
						<a href="https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais" target="_blank" class="gp"><i class="fa fa-google-plus"></i>Google+</a>
						<!--<a href="" target="_blank"  class="ig"><i class="fa fa-instagram"></i>Instagram</a>-->
					</nav>
				</div>

				<div class="destaques">
                								<div class="destaques-left">
					  								<div class="destaque-1">

				<div class="editorias-conteudo">

					<h1>TODOS ESPECIAIS</h1>

					<div class="lista-artistas">
							<ul>

								

								<li>
																					<img src="http://www.estrelando.com.br/uploads/2015/06/10/familia-real-britanica-1433924719.300x300.jpg" width="245" height="245">
																		<div class="hover-lista-artistas">
										<a href="http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais-interna/família-real-206">Família Real</a>
										<div class="compartilhar-perfil">
											<nav>
												<a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais-interna/família-real-206" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-facebook-square"></i></a>
												<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?via=Estrelando&url=http://www.estrelando.com.br/especiais-interna/família-real-206" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></a>

											</nav>
